verbs.description: handmade buttons [ARGM-TMP: once] [V: considered] [ARG1: phantom gain] new attention shiho murota of tarumizu kagoshima prefecture japan revived the buttons more than 10 years ago her meticulous craftwork has become so popular she now receives orders from overseas tarumizu kagoshima shiho murota kagoshima prefecture japan
